name: Protector (Blubberquark Software)
description:
You're the barbarian. You love your dog. You must protect the dog. There's only one problem. Your dog is stupid, and it will chase its favourite bone without a care for lightning, arrows, spikes, or fall damage. Get your dog home safe!

Controls:

  • walk with left and right arrow keys
  • raise your shield with the up arrow
  • jump with C
  • throw bone/call dog with X
  • walk to the bone to pick it up again

Made for Ludum Dare 46, theme "keep it alive"
